response.overview: Trapped within the nightmarish confines of a cursed house, Father Gabriel's faith and sanity are put to the ultimate test. As he battles the demonic presence that taunts him at every turn, he must also confront his own personal demons that threaten to consume him from within. Unseen forces unleash terror upon him through haunting visions, unnerving disappearances, and unholy psychological games, all meticulously designed to break the priest's spirit and drive him to the brink of madness.
response.title: The Summoning
